update information_pipeline set source = #{source,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, newsTitle = #{newstitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, releaseTime = #{releasetime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, impTime = #{imptime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, filenum = #{filenum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, createTime = #{createtime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, updateTime = #{updatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, istatus = #{istatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, information_id = #{informationId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, deptcode = #{deptcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, deptname = #{deptname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, pre_distinct = #{preDistinct,jdbcType=INTEGER}, xwColumn = #{xwcolumn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, filename = #{filename,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, websitesource = #{websitesource,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, error_status = #{errorStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, fjcount = #{fjcount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, personincharge = #{personincharge,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, keyword = #{keyword,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, rjs1 = #{rjs1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, extend1 = #{extend1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, extend2 = #{extend2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, extend3 = #{extend3,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id,source,newsTitle,newsContent,releaseTime,impTime,filenum,attachment,createTime,updateTime,istatus,information_id as informationId,deptcode,deptname,pre_distinct as preDistinct,xwColumn,fjian,websitesource,error_status as errorStatus,fjcount,filename,keyword,rjs1,extend1 from information_pipeline where istatus = 0 and impTime in(${websiteids}) and error_status = 0 order by updateTime desc

select id,source,newsTitle,newsContent,releaseTime,impTime,filenum,attachment,createTime,updateTime,istatus,information_id as informationId,deptcode,deptname,pre_distinct as preDistinct,xwColumn,fjian,websitesource,error_status as errorStatus,fjcount,filename,keyword,rjs1,extend1 from information_pipeline where istatus = 0 and impTime in(${websiteids}) and error_status = 0 order by updateTime desc

select id,source,newsTitle,newsContent,releaseTime,impTime,filenum,attachment,createTime,updateTime,istatus,information_id as informationId,deptcode,deptname,pre_distinct as preDistinct,xwColumn,fjian,websitesource,error_status as errorStatus,fjcount from information_pipeline where istatus = 0 and xwColumn = 100003 order by updateTime desc

select id,source,newsTitle,newsContent,releaseTime,impTime,filenum,attachment,createTime,updateTime,istatus,information_id as informationId,deptcode,deptname,pre_distinct as preDistinct,xwColumn,fjian,websitesource,error_status as errorStatus,fjcount from information_pipeline where istatus = 0 and xwColumn = 100002 order by updateTime desc
select max(filename) from information_pipeline where filename like '${username}%'
select * from information_pipeline where source = #{source}
select id from information_pipeline where id > #{0} and xwColumn = #{1} order by id asc limit 0,1
select id from information_pipeline where id < #{0} and xwColumn = #{1} order by id desc limit 0,1
select id from information_pipeline where id < #{0} and xwColumn = #{1} and impTime in (${websiteids}) AND istatus = 0 order by id desc limit 0,1
select id from information_pipeline where id > #{0} and xwColumn = #{1} and impTime in (${websiteids}) AND istatus = 0 order by id asc limit 0,1

select id,source,newsTitle,newsContent,releaseTime,impTime,filenum,attachment,createTime,updateTime,istatus,information_id as informationId,deptcode,deptname,pre_distinct as preDistinct,xwColumn,fjian,websitesource,error_status as errorStatus,fjcount from information_pipeline where istatus = 0 and xwColumn = 100002 and impTime in (${websiteid}) order by updateTime desc

select id,source,newsTitle,newsContent,releaseTime,impTime,filenum,attachment,createTime,updateTime,istatus,information_id as informationId,deptcode,deptname,pre_distinct as preDistinct,xwColumn,fjian,websitesource,error_status as errorStatus,fjcount from information_pipeline where istatus = 0 and xwColumn = 100003 and impTime in (${websiteid}) order by updateTime desc

select id,source,newsTitle,newsContent,releaseTime,impTime,filenum,attachment,createTime,updateTime,istatus,information_id as informationId,deptcode,deptname,pre_distinct as preDistinct,xwColumn,fjian,websitesource,error_status as errorStatus,fjcount from information_pipeline where istatus = 1 and xwColumn = #{0} and impTime in (${websiteids}) order by updateTime desc
select id from information_pipeline where id > #{0} and xwColumn = #{1} AND istatus = 1 order by id asc limit 0,1
select id from information_pipeline where id < #{0} and xwColumn = #{1} AND istatus = 1 order by id desc limit 0,1
select id from information_pipeline where id < #{0} and xwColumn = #{1} AND istatus = 1 and impTime in (${websiteids}) order by id desc limit 0,1
select id from information_pipeline where id > #{0} and xwColumn = #{1} AND istatus = 1 and impTime in (${websiteids}) order by id asc limit 0,1
